args: The experiment to manifest a demon in a\nhuman host body was a success. It is now\ntime for the next step.
It is time to use the sealing stone to bring\ninto this world the source of its miasmaâ€”\na mimicry used to seal a demon.
A village in North Grastaea\nInside a private home
We came running when we heard screams\nand apprehended the perpetrator, but it\nwas already over...
Say it again. Why did you attack a family\nyou didn't know?
As I passed by the house,\nI smelled the most delicious cake.
But when I went inside to get it, the people\nwere so NOISY! It pissed me off, so I killed\nthem all.
That's the reason you committed this\ncrime?
The cake was only so-so. And it made my\nhands all sticky, and I HATED that! Also,\ntheir dying screams were so shrill.
Cut the crap! Do you have no conception\nat all of the crime you've committed?!\nNo guilt or regret?!
Nah. Mama told me not to sweat it.
And if I have a bad time, Mama will make\nthe bad feelings and memories go away!
I've no idea what this man is on about.
So we've another worshipper of Mama,\ndo we?
Pinon and Gabriel.\nDo you two know something?
We've had a spate of grim incidents\nhappening in towns and villages in the\nvicinity of Grams.
Murders, robberies, arson... The types of\ncrimes and the motives all vary, but there\nis one commonality between the culprits.

None of them feel a shred of guilt. In fact,
they appear to be uniformly unconcerned
they've committed crimes at all. And when
we investigate further, invariably...
They bring up a person called Mama.
It seems that this ï¼‚Mamaï¼‚ is the one\ninciting the various wrongdoings.\nThen there's the matter of her appearance.
Oh, IT'S MAMA! Hey, Mama!\nGuess what? I had so much FUN!
She looks just like Gabriel?! Wait.\nThen does that mean this Mama could\nactually be...?
An angel of salvation has come to us from\nthe Church. Oh, thank you, thank you...
My dear, sweet, beloved children.\nWill you tell me of the troubles you bear?
There's someone I like, but their heart\nlies somewhere else. What should I do,\nO heavenly angel?
It would be such a waste for you to give\nup on them. I will place a blessing of love\nupon you.
The harvest was bad this year, and I worry\nthat the people of the village may not\nsurvive the winter.
This world is full of anxiety, isn't it?\nBut rest easy. I will help you forget it all.
Now, how is that?\nHave your worries subsided?
Yes, Mama. Goodness, how was I ever\nso distraught over such simple matters?
All I have to do is crush the life out of the\nstupid woman! Just like I've always done!
That's right! If there isn't enough for us,\nwe'll just steal it from someplace else!\nJust like we've always done!
That's sooo right, my good little girls and\nboys! You never ever have to go without\nwhat you WANT!
Your Mama will be so terribly happy if\nyou grow up carefree, doing absolutely\nANYTHING YOU WANT!

And if you're ever seized with garbage
feelings like GUILT, you just tell your
Mama, okay? I'll make it aaall go
away, my dear sweet little ones!
I'm going to purify the miasma possessing\nthe villagers! Haaah!
So ï¼‚Mamaï¼‚ was you after all: the\nother me, in whom a demon is sealed.
The angel this mimicry was based upon\nand her apostle... And to make matters\nworse, some OTHER people, as well.
You were using miasma to make people\ncommit crimes.
You instill in them false memories of\nhaving sinned, to reduce their resistance\nto committing criminal acts.
You have driven people to depravity.\nI could not forgive myself were I to suffer\nyou to continue this debauched behavior.
Depravity? Rude!\nI do it because I love them!
Laws, morality, common sense... There can\nbe no freedom in a heart bound up by such\nconstraining notions! Isn't that pathetic?

Their violent impulses matter little so
long as they grow up free. And so, I have
released them from their fetters with false
memories!
It's not love to destroy their lives and the\nlives of those around them!
We cannot allow you to continue\nthese despicable transgressions.\nI shall administer Her authority!
Oh, come ON already!\nYou would disobey Mama?!
I won't suffer naughty children.\nNaughty children must be PUNISHED!
